root.name: box()
root.description: A box is an extruded rectangle. A box with equal dimension on all sides is a cube.

parameter.label: size
parameter.description: int or float: dimension of the box in all dimensions, creates a cube

parameter.label: width
parameter.description: int or float: dimension of the box in the x-dimension

parameter.label: height
parameter.description: int or float: dimension of the box in the y-dimension

parameter.label: depth
parameter.description: int or float: dimension of the box in the z-dimension
